DOC.brief_summary: This research evaluate efficacy new online self- help intervention , Wellness Workbook , individual chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) . Participants randomly assign use Wellness Workbook alternative self-help material assess baseline , post-intervention ( 10 week ) follow-up ( 18 week ) . Outcome measure include pain-related disability pain severity .
DOC.brief_title: Online Cognitive Behavioral Therapy ( CBT ) Workbook
DOC.detailed_description: This research evaluate efficacy new online self- help intervention , Wellness Workbook , individual chronic low back pain ( CLBP ) . The Wellness Workbook interactive online intervention use evidence-based cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBT ) strategy , behavioral activation mindfulness train increase chronic pain patient ' quality life . 198 patient chronic low back pain randomly assign use Wellness Workbook alternative self-help material 10 week . Participants assess baseline , post-intervention ( 10 week ) follow-up ( 18 week ) . Outcome measure include pain-related disability , pain severity , physical activity , mindfulness pain-related attitude belief .
DOC.criteria: currently experience chronic noncancer pain low back health diagnosis would prevent him/her participate fully program ( e.g. , receive treatment cancer ) regular Internet access
